description:
Kajiwara Jun is a prominent character in the story and part of http://anidb.net/ch64305 [Akira]`s entourage. He is close with http://anidb.net/ch64308 [Naoya], who casually bullies and bosses him around.
Eventually, he and Naoya are captured by http://anidb.net/ch60801 [Maya]. He witnessed the murder of his friend by the aforementioned. And, decides to submit to the will of his captor, becoming her pet. Later, Maya releases him, but he has become psychologically tormented and rapes http://anidb.net/ch60800 [Seiya], only to be killed by Maya.
He is shorter than other males of the group, his skin is fair, he has short brown messy hair and orange eyes. He wears a red camp shirt and violet-blue jeans. Much like Naoya, he also carries a wristwatch.
name: Kajiwara Jun
